alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Clay; Hutchinson; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 8:14AM MST until January 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Iowa, northeast Nebraska and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Clay; Hutchinson; Union; Yankton
